name: Bloodrush (MisterProject, andrebariani)
description:
When death is certain and life is short, it's time to rush for blood.

Bloodrush is a slick, satisfying and fast-paced hack n' slash boss rush. With every aberration vanquished, the enemies only grow stronger, faster and more numerous, ensuring that your death will come, sooner or later.

CONTROLS:
Left Click: Sword attack, Deflect
Right Click: Revolver
Space: Dash
Space, Left Click: Dash Attack
Shift: String
Shift+Left Click: Crossdash
Shift+Right Click: Smokeshot

CREDITS
Anderson Garrote: Boss Art, Game Design
André Bariani: Character Art, Programming, Sound Design, Game Design
Dan "MisterProject" Isamu: Menu Art, Programming, Sound Design, Game Design
